annotations.description: Zero to many annotations on a sample

description.description: a human-readable description of a thing

has_characteristic.description: Links an annotation to the field/characteristic

has_normalized_value.description: Links an annotation to the normalized/parsed raw value

has_numeric_value.description: Links a quantity value to a number

has_raw_value.description: The value that was specified for an annotation in raw form, i.e. a string. E.g. "2 cm" or "2-4 cm"

has_unit.description: Links a quantity value to a unit

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI

input.description: An input biosample to a processing step

involved_in.description: Links a biosample to a project that makes use of it.

name.description: A human readable label for an entity

output.description: An output biosample to a processing step

part_of.description: Links a resource to another resource that either logically or physically includes it.

Annotation.description: An annotation on a sample. This is essentially a key value pair

has_characteristic.description: Links an annotation to the field/characteristic

has_normalized_value.description: Links an annotation to the normalized/parsed raw value

has_raw_value.description: The value that was specified for an annotation in raw form, i.e. a string. E.g. "2 cm" or "2-4 cm"

Annotation.title: Annotation

Biosample.description: A material sample. May be environmental (encompassing many organisms) or isolate or tissue

annotations.description: Zero to many annotations on a sample

involved_in.description: Links a biosample to a project that makes use of it.

Biosample.title: Biosample

BiosampleProcessing.description: A process that takes one or more biosamples as inputs and generates one or more as output

input.description: An input biosample to a processing step

output.description: An output biosample to a processing step

BiosampleProcessing.title: BiosampleProcessing

Characteristic.description: A characteristic of a biosample. Examples: depth, habitat, material, ... For NMDC, characteristics SHOULD be mapped to fields within a MIxS template
Characteristic.title: Characteristic

ControlledTermValue.description: A controlled term or class from an ontology
ControlledTermValue.title: ControlledTermValue

GeolocationValue.description: A normalized value for a location on the earth's surface
GeolocationValue.title: GeolocationValue

description.description: a human-readable description of a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI

name.description: A human readable label for an entity

part_of.description: Links a resource to another resource that either logically or physically includes it.

NormalizedValue.description: The value that was specified for an annotation in parsed/normalized form. This could be a range of different types
NormalizedValue.title: NormalizedValue

Project.description: An individual or collaborative enterprise that is carefully planned and designed to achieve a particular aim.
Project.title: Project

has_numeric_value.description: Links a quantity value to a number

has_unit.description: Links a quantity value to a unit

Study.description: A detailed investigation that  defines the overall goal of a research proposal.  It contains the list of sequencing projects that are part of the original proposal. (see https://gold.jgi.doe.gov/resources/project_help_doc.pdf)
Study.title: Study
